channel.title: Buffing
channel.description:
I accidentally kicked my xbox with my brand fucking new game in there (red dead redemption) and it fucked up the game. :( and it has a huge scratch like a circle around the whole thing and it won't load. my friend is an idiot but has been right before and saiz that you cant buff a game with the circle like that
is that true and should i not waste my time walking 30 minutes to gamestop to find out?

item.title: Buffing
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

This happened to my xbox, except I didn’t actually touch it. Was playing Modern Warfare 2 when I heard a grinding sound and pulled out the disc and it was unusable after that (scratches in the shape of rings). If you contact Microsoft and tell them that you were just playing you can get a new xbox, replacement game & a free month xbox live membership.

Read full topic
